attributes.action: Hold a general election on October 15 and let the country decide our government
attributes.additional_details: It is absurd that at such a time of damaging political crisis, the electorate are being denied a voice by the very people who should be holding the government to account. Why? Are they scared of the answer they might get from our population?
attributes.background: The current make-up of the House of Commons has resulted in inertia, making our country the laughing stock of the world.
